previous.value: A reputed hybrid E. racemosa x E. umbra was the basis of E. anomala Blakely (Pryor & Johnson, 1971; Chippendale, 1988).  A reputed hybrid E. piperita subsp. urceolaris x E. racemosa (as E. sclerophylla) is the basis for E. congener Maiden & Blakely (Pryor & Johnson ,1971; Chippendale, 1988).  A reputed hybrid E. moorei x E. racemosa is the basis of E. haemastoma var. montana H.Deane & Maiden and E. montana (H.Deane & Maiden) Blakely (Pryor & Johnson, 1971; Chippendale, 1988).  A reputed hybrid E. eugenioides x E. racemosa is the basis for E. penrithensis Maiden (Pryor & Johnson, 1971; Chippendale, 1988).  A reputed hybrid E. blaxlandii x E. racemosa is the basis for E. petrophila Blakely (Pryor & Johnson, 1971; Chippendale, 1988).  Occasional hybrids between E. carnea and 'E. signata' (=E. racemosa) are recorded (Hill, 1999).  A reputed hybrid E. racemosa x E. stricta is the basis for E. tephrophloia Blakely (Pryor & Johnson, 1971; Chippendale, 1988).  Hybrids are known between E. radiata subsp. radiata and 'E. sclerophylla' (E. racemosa) (Johnson & Hill, 1990).
